Training¶

handwriting.training.train.train_conditional(settings)[source]¶

Train RNN for conditional handwriting generation

Train for specified number of epochs and batches Display 2D NLL loss and BCE loss to monitor training Save model every epoch Save a generated sample every epoch + other plots like attention

Parameters:settings (ExperimentSettings) – custom class to hold hyperparams
handwriting.training.train.train_unconditional(settings)[source]¶

Train RNN for unconditional handwriting generation

Train for specified number of epochs and batches Display 2D NLL loss and BCE loss to monitor training Save model every 5 epochs Save a generated sample every epoch

Parameters:settings (ExperimentSettings) – custom class to hold hyperparams
